Please upload them in MKV or FLV. Your MP4s don't play on my tv and when I convert them, the video looks choppy. MKV or FLV both convert flawlessly using Handbrake. In fact, your FLVs have the best VQ I've ever seen. Great work!! And thanks for upping GH!
